name: It's a wrap!
description:
It’s a wrap! is a 2D puzzle-platformer set in Hollywood of the 80s where you are both the director and the main actor of low-budget movies.
All you want to do is shoot a nice trashy movie, but here’s the catch: the other actors and props are constantly messing up their timings and you as the director have to fix that by synchronizing everything before you can roll the camera and play out the scene.
